DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate different side effect contraceptive use two oral combine contraceptive pill ( OCP ) combination 30 mcg ethinylestradiol/2 mg chlormadinone acetate ( Belara速 ) 30 mcg ethinylestradiol/3 mg drospirenone ( Yasmin速 ) , especially body weight change .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Body Weight Change During Contraception With Belara Yasmin
DOC.detailed_description: Oral combine contraceptive pill ( OCP ) contraceptive use reproductive woman . The various type progestin OCP give various effect either benefit ( non-contraceptive benefit ) side effect . These effect depend pharmacological activity progestin . Many study show cause discontinuation use OCP , increase body weight , androgenic effect vaginal spotting . OCP combination 30 mcg ethinylestradiol/2 mg chlormadinone acetate ( Belara速 ) 30 mcg ethinylestradiol/3 mg drospirenone ( Yasmin速 ) common use practice . The type progestin ( chlormadinone drospirenone ) might effect different outcome woman especially body weight change use . Chlormadinone C-21 progestin glucocorticoid antiandrogenic effect . Drospirenone progestin spironolactone derivative antimineralocorticoid antiandrogenic effect . Both progestin might less effect body weight change provide non-contraceptive benefit . So investigator want study different effect progestin two type OCP . The result study could give information choose proper OCP reproductive woman .
DOC.criteria: Reproductive woman Woman BMI < 28.5 kg/m2 . Woman regular menstruation . Woman n't pelvic organ disorder . Woman want contraception oral contraceptive pill . Woman abnormal blood pressure Woman abnormal vaginal bleeding Pregnant woman Woman medication effect contraceptive pill , antifungal , antiretroviral , anticonvulsant drug . Woman contraindication OCP . Woman use steroid 3 month period enrollment study . Smoking Woman eat habit disorder .
